sentence.text: The gene that encodes C1q/TNF-related protein 5 (CTRP5), a secreted protein of the C1q family, is mutated in individuals with late-onset retinal degeneration.
Adipose expression of CTRP5 was markedly upregulated in obese and diabetic humans and in genetic and dietary models of obesity in rodents.
Inhibition of CTRP5 action may result in the alleviation of insulin resistance associated with obesity and diabetes
